text: They Bought a Boat is a 1914 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Royal Byron as Captain Jack Burns (as Roy Byron) * C.W. Ritchie as Captain Billy Hale * Ed Lawrence as Government Inspector * James Levering as Ancient Mariner * Billy Bowers as Jack Kedge * Oliver Hardy as Cabin Boy (as Babe Hardy) ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:1914 short films Category:Films directed by Arthur Hotaling Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: They Bought a Boat
